The effects that an opioid has on the body is dangerous in all forms. And should not be sold. Because regardless of the form .. the brain will tell the body that endorphins need to be activated … in order to survive. At some point.
full_text.3: @Rachael_wv @monicaonairtalk @AlphaWarriorPod @Realpersonpltcs @manofjustice007 @WayneDupreeShow @Timcast The crap they get on the streets is non organic. For example .. the main ingredient to make synthetic opioid called fentanyl is MANNITOL. That’s 62% of the main ingredient. Mannitol is a chemical by product as a result of making sugar-free sweeteners. And synthetic smells.
full_text.4: @Rachael_wv @monicaonairtalk @AlphaWarriorPod @Realpersonpltcs @manofjustice007 @WayneDupreeShow @Timcast A form of opioid (chemical product)  is in cough medicine. And diarrhea medication sold over the counter. Different from for example .. The preparation Opioids is base organic H3Oc, Ho, and CH3d. COD. D stands for double bond. All organic compounds.
